participant_1.background:
I used to be very outgoing, but now I prefer to keep to myself.
i have three children.
I enjoy writing my dreams down because they often tell me a lot about myself.
i work for peta.
i m going back to school.

participant_2.background:
I used to rely on my own strength to stay healthy, but now I trust God to help me.
I'm a bit of a loner, but I love spending time with my family on special occasions.
i have a poodle named nanette.
i am in high school.
I enjoy spending my free time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs.

content.text: Not much! I'm just hanging out. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting ready to head to work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I work for PETA. It's a great organization that fights for animal rights.
That's awesome! I've always admired PETA. I'm in high school right now, but I'm thinking about going back to school to study animal science.
That's a great idea! Animal science is a really interesting field.
Thanks! I think it would be really cool to work with animals.
Yeah, it would be! You could always volunteer at a local animal shelter or rescue organization to get some experience.
That's a great idea! I'll have to look into that.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
